mapper.insert: insert into storge_event (event, uid, channel_Id, device_Id, channel_Code, user_Channel_Code, record_Id, source_Id, plate_Num, rec_Type, rec_Code, cap_Time, traffic_Light_State, #{jobId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{imgUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

mapper.select: select s.*,p.palce_name as channel_name, palce_x as channel_x,palce_y as channel_y from storge_event s,sys_palce_info p where p.palce_no=s.channel_Code and s.plate_Num_A=#{plateNumA} ORDER BY cap_Time DESC limit 0,10
